title: Dead or Alive 5: Last Round – v1.10C + All DLCs + Unlocker
body:
Dead or Alive 5: Last Round – v1.10C + All DLCs + Unlocker


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Fighting, Side, 3D
Companies: Team Ninja, Koei Tecmo
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 11.2 GB
Repack Size: 4.3 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on DEAD.OR.ALIVE.5.Last.Round.Core.Fighters.TECMO.50th.Anniversary.Edition-SKIDROW ISO release: sr-doa5lrcft50thae.iso (12,025,561,088 bytes)
  • 73 DLCs are included and activated
  • Optional Russian localization v1.3 added, thanks to ZoG Team; notice, that it replaced English translation
  • Stuff Unlocker Save is available in “Unlocker” folder after installation; check readme.txt inside that folder for instructions how to unlock items and other stuff (NOT everything!)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 11.2 to 4.3 GB)
  • Installation takes 12-30 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 13 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language; for conversion to/from English/Russian use “Convert to English.bat” and “Convert to Russian.bat” batches in the repack folder
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The final word in fighting entertainment – DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round!
